vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Ἄγαβος, -ου, ὁ
Agabus: Act.11:28, 21:10.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the New Testament, first mentioned at Act.11.28
§ Agabus, (Proper name), Acts 11:28; 21:10*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
亞迦布 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "蝗蟲"
一位基督徒先知 (徒 11:28,21:10)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
亚迦布 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "蝗虫"
一位基督徒先知 (徒 11:28,21:10)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: A-ga-bút, « yêu thương (?)» là tiên tri trong Hội thánh. H2285
